name: Roasted Sweet Potatoes and Vegetables With Thyme and Maple Syrup
author: Anonymous
summary: Packed with flavor, these potatoes are a brilliant addition to any feast. Different from the norm, this dish will grace any table.
ingredients: 1 pound sweet potatoes, cut into long, thin rectangles
1 large carrot, cut into long, thin rectangles
1  parsnip, cut into long, thin rectangles
extra-virgin olive oil, or as needed
salt and ground black pepper to taste
2 tablespoons maple syrup, or to taste
directions: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Scatter pieces of sweet potato, carrot, and parsnip onto a jelly roll pan; drizzle with olive oil and season with salt and black pepper
Roast in the preheated oven until vegetables are partially soft, about 30 minutes
Scatter thyme sprigs over vegetables and drizzle with maple syrup
Return to oven and bake until vegetables are soft, about 15 more minutes
